public boolean isAvailable()
Specified by:
isAvailable in class Resource
Returns:

compareTo

public int compareTo(Resource r)
Orders food based on availability time, descending.

Parameters:
r - The FoodItem object to compare against.
Returns:
Negative if this food item will finish sooner, 0 if the two items will finish times will be the same, otherwise a positive number.
